name: BLACKWATCH INTERNATIONAL
sampleDescriptions: Funding to complete the Defense Microelectronic Activity (DMEA) Building 2 low-volume military-grade semiconduction fabrication facility within the Department of Defense.
Funding to complete the Defense Microelectronic Activity (DMEA) Building 2 low-volume military-grade semiconduction fabrication facility within the Department of Defense.
Seeking appropriations to fully fund the Defense Department's DMEA Building 2 low-volume, military grade semiconductor foundry.
HASC and SASC requests to support authorization for full funding of the Defense Department's DMEA Building 2 low-volume, military-grade semiconductor fabrication facility.
Seeking appropriations to fully fund the Defense Department's DMEA Building 2 low-volume, military grade semiconductor foundry.
